name: BNNSLSTMGateDescriptor
desc: A structure that describes a long short-term memory (LSTM) gate layer.

items.name: init(iw_desc: (BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, BNNSNDArrayDescriptor), hw_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, cw_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, b_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, activation: BNNSActivation)
items.desc: Returns a new long short-term memory (LSTM) gate descriptor structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new long short-term memory (LSTM) gate descriptor structure.

items.name: var iw_desc: (BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: The descriptor of the input weights.

items.name: var hw_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the hidden weights.

items.name: var cw_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the cell weights.

items.name: var activation: BNNSActivation
items.desc: The activation function that the layer applies to the output.
